command.title: Filtrado con CASE complejo
command.description: Lógica condicional detallada para limpieza de datos. [Source Table: Bikestream]

part.desc: Verifica si el vecindario es nulo o cadena vacía.
Asigna valor por defecto si cumple la condición.

command.full: SELECT CASE WHEN Neighbourhood IS NULL OR Neighbourhood = '' THEN 'Unidentified' ELSE Neighbourhood END AS Neighbourhood, SUM(No_Bikes) AS [Total Number of Bikes] FROM Bikestream GROUP BY CASE WHEN Neighbourhood IS NULL OR Neighbourhood = '' THEN 'Unidentified' ELSE Neighbourhood END HAVING Neighbourhood = 'Chelsea' ORDER BY Neighbourhood ASC;
